dashboard.name: cdbc5818-6c3f-48c2-a547-0c9671133091
dashboard.description: The Correlation dashboard provides a consolidated view of Cyware Intel Exchange Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) and their relationships with security events across multiple data sources. It enables visualization and correlation of threat intelligence with observed activity, helping analysts quickly identify patterns and validate threats.

dashboardCharts.name: a13a7569-ebf0-4927-82df-24fedad0d9a1
dashboardCharts.displayName: Number of Cyware IOC Matches by IOC Type
dashboardCharts.description: Number of Cyware IOC Matches by IOC Type

dashboardCharts.name: 4f519b3d-a4be-42bb-9b9b-31fcbaa71dc6
dashboardCharts.description: Top 10 IOC Values for ioc matches by its frequency.

query.query:
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_DOMAIN"
    and (target.hostname=${ioc_val} OR network.dns.questions.name=${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_IP"
    and (target.ip = ${ioc_val} OR network.dns.answers.data = ${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_FILE_HASH_MD5"
    and (principal.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR principal.process.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR target.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR target.process.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR security_result.about.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR src.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR src.process.file.md5 = ${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_FILE_HASH_SHA256"
    and (principal.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR principal.process.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR target.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR target.process.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR security_result.about.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR src.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR src.process.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_FILE_HASH_SHA1"
    and (principal.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR principal.process.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR target.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR target.process.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR security_result.about.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR src.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR src.process.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val})
)

dashboardCharts.name: 94bf2848-4363-4d04-9778-97b8896e27f2
dashboardCharts.description: Number of Unique IOC Matches in SecOps for Last 24 Hours.

dashboardCharts.displayName: Number of Cyware IOCs By Risk Score

markdown.content:
## ![Cyware Logo](https://cdn.cyware.com/logos/cyware-intel-exchange.png) Cyware Intel Exchange - Correlation Overview
---
The Correlation dashboard is designed to identify relationships of Cyware Intel Exchange IOCs and events from other sources.

**IOC Match Visibility**: Monitor IOCs matched in your environment

dashboardCharts.name: b528ee4c-6ca6-470f-8856-1b8ab5de93ca
dashboardCharts.description: Number of Unique IOC Matches in SecOps for Last 30 Days.

dashboardCharts.name: 3ac2894c-6728-41ed-9874-d5917726cca8
dashboardCharts.description: Details of Matched IOCs. Results are limited to 10000 IOC matches.

query.query:
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_DOMAIN"
    and (target.hostname=${ioc_val} OR network.dns.questions.name=${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_IP"
    and (target.ip = ${ioc_val} OR network.dns.answers.data = ${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_FILE_HASH_MD5"
    and (principal.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR principal.process.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR target.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR target.process.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR security_result.about.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR src.file.md5 = ${ioc_val} OR src.process.file.md5 = ${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_FILE_HASH_SHA256"
    and (principal.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR principal.process.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR target.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR target.process.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR security_result.about.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR src.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val} OR src.process.file.sha256 = ${ioc_val})
)
OR
(
    ${ioc_type} = "IOC_TYPE_FILE_HASH_SHA1"
    and (principal.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR principal.process.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR target.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR target.process.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR security_result.about.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR src.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val} OR src.process.file.sha1 = ${ioc_val})
)

dashboardQueries.name: 55fe7b0d-80b3-4a9b-b129-66721972fbc8
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ioc_val = ioc.ioc_value 
$ioc_type = ioc.ioc_type 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
outcome:
    $ip_count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ioc_val, "|", $ioc_type, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))

dashboardQueries.name: 808a9781-586f-447b-9606-6eeb10be7619
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ioc_val = ioc.ioc_value
$ioc_type = ioc.ioc_type
$confidence = ioc.confidence_score
$classification = strings.to_upper(ioc.severity)
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds)
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region!="", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match: 
    $ioc_val, $ioc_type, $classification, $category, $latitude, $longitude, $match_bucket, $country, $confidence
outcome:
    $hostname = re.replace(re.replace(re.replace(arrays.join_string(array_distinct(ioc.asset.hostname), ","), ",,+", ","), "^,|,$", ""), "^\\s*$|^$", "-")
order:
    $match_bucket desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: 4007b4ca-7385-4d3e-bd86-6eb17c8ab12c
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ioc_val = ioc.ioc_value
$ioc_type = ioc.ioc_type
$classification = ioc.severity
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match: 
    $ioc_type
outcome: 
    $count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ioc_val, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country)) 
order: 
    $count desc 
limit: 
    10

dashboardQueries.name: dbdc3300-7283-49e6-8f0a-0d6b1602bb80
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ioc_val = ioc.ioc_value 
$ioc_type = ioc.ioc_type
$classification = ioc.severity
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match: 
    $ioc_val, $ioc_type
outcome: 
    $count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ioc_val, "|", $ioc_type, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))
order: 
    $count desc 
limit: 
    10

dashboardQueries.name: e440a105-e5d4-491d-9c08-759e802b76ba
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$score = cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score)
$entityid = ioc.ioc_value

$risk_category = if(cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) = 0, "None", if(cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) >= 1 and cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) <= 29, "Low", if(cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) >= 30 and cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) <= 69, "Medium", if(cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) >= 70, "High", "Unknown"))))
match:
    $risk_category
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    15

dashboardQueries.name: 9db23985-34b4-4c61-bd5e-11bf8fc9a607
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ioc_val = ioc.ioc_value 
$ioc_type = ioc.ioc_type 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
outcome:
    $ip_count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ioc_val, "|", $ioc_type, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))

dashboardQueries.name: c86fb2a9-c284-45ca-ba81-1b425032885b
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
strings.to_lower(ioc.severity) = "medium" or (cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) >= 30 and cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) <= 69)
outcome:
    $medium_severity_ioc_count = count_distinct(ioc.ioc_value)

dashboardQueries.name: 2f892bdc-fcb7-4166-9482-7da024fb18c5
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
strings.to_lower(ioc.severity) = "high" or (cast.as_int(ioc.confidence_score) >= 70)
outcome:
    $high_severity_ioc_count = count_distinct(ioc.ioc_value)

dashboardQueries.name: ea59858c-90a6-4c89-b224-28d446ac659a
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ioc_val = ioc.ioc_value 
$ioc_type = ioc.ioc_type 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
outcome:
    $ip_count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ioc_val, "|", $ioc_type, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))

dashboardQueries.name: 69aef190-3c2c-41a2-b6eb-1dac3e0d9779
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude
ioc.location.country_or_region != ""
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match:
    $country
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ip, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))
    $max_latitude = max(ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude)
    $max_longitude = max(ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: 91e7bdad-0adf-47e8-a02f-74974fe6b107
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "CTIX"
ioc.feed_name = "Cyware Intel Exchange"
$ioc_val = ioc.ioc_value
$date=timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds)
$severity = strings.to_upper(ioc.severity)
match:
    $date, $severity
outcome:
    $count=count_distinct($ioc_val)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10000
